welcome_title: Welcome to NOX Group Grading Portal
welcome_description: Track your professional growth, identify development opportunities, and advance your career with transparent, data-driven insights.
confidentiality_text: All information submitted through this portal is strictly confidential and used solely for professional development purposes. Providing false information may result in disciplinary action. By using this system, you acknowledge and accept these terms.
accept_terms: I have read and accept the terms and conditions stated above
choose_highest_education: Choose your highest level of education

how.heading: How to Use the Portal
how.subheading: Follow these simple steps to grade yourself and track your professional growth.
how.desc1: Fill out all sections honestly, including education, certifications, experience, and language proficiency. Each section contributes to your final score.
how.desc2: After submission, view your detailed breakdown showing how each category contributes to your total score and recommended designation.
how.desc3: Visit the Progress page to see your grading history and identify areas for improvement over time.
how.tip1: Internal experience contributes to external experience at 0.5 years for each year of service.
how.tip2: Update your grades regularly to track your improvement and career advancement.

certification_step.desc: Select the number of certifications you have in each category
certification_step.note_text: Choose your certification level (Low, Medium, or High). The system allows only one selection and automatically includes your points from previous categories.
certification_step.medium_certificates_examples: Examples: Digital marketing, Project management, Cybersecurity

step3.title: External Experience (Excluding Management)
step3.subtitle: Select your years of external non-management experience
step3.note_text: For external experience gained within the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, please attach the Mudad Wa Ujoor Certificate issued by the General Organization for Social Insurance (GOSI).

step4.title: External Management Experience
step4.subtitle: Select your years of external management experience
step4.note_text: For external experience gained within the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, please attach the Mudad Wa Ujoor Certificate issued by the General Organization for Social Insurance (GOSI).

english_proficiency_step.title: English Proficiency
english_proficiency_step.desc: Select your English language proficiency level

step6.title: Internal Experience (Excluding Management)
step6.subtitle: Select your years of internal non-management experience
step6.note: Internal experience contributes to external experience calculations at 0.5 years per year of service.

step7.title: Internal Management Experience
step7.subtitle: Select your years of internal management experience
step7.note: Internal management experience is weighted at 25% of your total score.

files.supported_formats: PNG, JPG, and PDF are allowed.
